m_ad_click_detected.description: Fire a pixel at the point the conditional allowlist is registered with the app

parameters.description: Whether the SERP-provided domain matches what was heuristically detected.

m_ad_click_active.description: Fire a pixel on the first instance an allowlist is "used", once per registration.

m_pageloads_with_ad_attribution.description: Aggregate the number of page loads that have had an active exemption over the course of some time period

parameters.description: Number of page loads with an exemption in time period
